trans-unit.source: This article shows how to access and use a device's lamp, if one is present.
trans-unit.target: This article shows how to access and use a device's lamp, if one is present.

trans-unit.source: Lamp functionality is managed separately from the device's camera and camera flash functionality.
trans-unit.target: Lamp functionality is managed separately from the device's camera and camera flash functionality.

trans-unit.source: In addition to acquiring a reference to the lamp and adjusting its settings, this article also shows you how to properly free up the lamp resource when it's not in use and how to detect when the lamp's availability changes in case it is being used by another app.
trans-unit.target: In addition to acquiring a reference to the lamp and adjusting its settings, this article also shows you how to properly free up the lamp resource when it's not in use and how to detect when the lamp's availability changes in case it is being used by another app.

trans-unit.target: Get the device's default lamp

trans-unit.source: The lamp APIs are found in the [**Windows.Devices.Lights**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn894331) namespace.

trans-unit.source: Get a specific lamp using the lamp selector string
trans-unit.target: Get a specific lamp using the lamp selector string

trans-unit.source: Some devices may have more than one lamp.
trans-unit.target: Some devices may have more than one lamp.

trans-unit.source: To obtain a list of lamps available on the device, get the device selector string by calling [**GetDeviceSelector**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn894328).
trans-unit.target: To obtain a list of lamps available on the device, get the device selector string by calling [**GetDeviceSelector**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn894328).

trans-unit.source: This selector string can then be passed into [**DeviceInformation.FindAllAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br225432).
trans-unit.target: This selector string can then be passed into [**DeviceInformation.FindAllAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br225432).

trans-unit.source: This method is used to enumerate many different kinds of devices and the selector string lets the method know to return only lamp devices.
trans-unit.target: This method is used to enumerate many different kinds of devices and the selector string lets the method know to return only lamp devices.

trans-unit.source: The [**DeviceInformationCollection**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br225395) object returned from **FindAllAsync** is a collection of [**DeviceInformation**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br225393) objects representing the lamps available on the device.
trans-unit.target: The [**DeviceInformationCollection**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br225395) object returned from **FindAllAsync** is a collection of [**DeviceInformation**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br225393) objects representing the lamps available on the device.

trans-unit.source: Select one of the objects in the list and then pass the [**Id**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br225437) property to [**Lamp.FromIdAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn894326) to get a reference to the requested lamp.
trans-unit.target: Select one of the objects in the list and then pass the [**Id**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br225437) property to [**Lamp.FromIdAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn894326) to get a reference to the requested lamp.

trans-unit.source: This example uses the **GetFirstOrDefault** extension method from the **System.Linq** namespace to select the **DeviceInformation** object where the [**EnclosureLocation.Panel**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br229906) property has a value of **Back**, which selects a lamp that is on the back of the device's enclosure, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: This example uses the **GetFirstOrDefault** extension method from the **System.Linq** namespace to select the **DeviceInformation** object where the [**EnclosureLocation.Panel**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br229906) property has a value of **Back**, which selects a lamp that is on the back of the device's enclosure, if one exists.

trans-unit.source: Note that the [**DeviceInformation**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br225393) APIs are found in the [**Windows.Devices.Enumeration**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br225459) namespace.
trans-unit.target: Note that the [**DeviceInformation**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br225393) APIs are found in the [**Windows.Devices.Enumeration**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br225459) namespace.

trans-unit.source: Register to be notified if the lamp availability changes
trans-unit.target: Register to be notified if the lamp availability changes

trans-unit.source: Lamp access is granted to the most recent app to request access.
trans-unit.target: Lamp access is granted to the most recent app to request access.

trans-unit.source: So, if another app is launched and requests a lamp resource that your app is currently using, your app will no longer be able to control the lamp until the other app has released the resource.
trans-unit.target: So, if another app is launched and requests a lamp resource that your app is currently using, your app will no longer be able to control the lamp until the other app has released the resource.

trans-unit.source: To receive a notification when the availability of the lamp changes, register a handler for the [**Lamp.AvailabilityChanged**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn894317) event.
trans-unit.target: To receive a notification when the availability of the lamp changes, register a handler for the [**Lamp.AvailabilityChanged**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn894317) event.

trans-unit.source: AvailabilityChanged
trans-unit.target: AvailabilityChanged

trans-unit.source: In the handler for the event, check the [**LampAvailabilityChanged.IsAvailable**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn894315) property to determine if the lamp is available.
trans-unit.target: In the handler for the event, check the [**LampAvailabilityChanged.IsAvailable**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn894315) property to determine if the lamp is available.

trans-unit.source: In this example, a toggle switch for turning the lamp on and off is enabled or disabled based on the lamp availability.
trans-unit.target: In this example, a toggle switch for turning the lamp on and off is enabled or disabled based on the lamp availability.

trans-unit.source: Properly dispose of the lamp resource when not in use
trans-unit.target: Properly dispose of the lamp resource when not in use

trans-unit.source: When you are no longer using the lamp, you should disable it and call [**Lamp.Close**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn894320) to release the resource and allow other apps to access the lamp.
trans-unit.target: When you are no longer using the lamp, you should disable it and call [**Lamp.Close**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn894320) to release the resource and allow other apps to access the lamp.

trans-unit.source: This property is mapped to the **Dispose** method if you are using C#.
trans-unit.target: This property is mapped to the **Dispose** method if you are using C#.

trans-unit.source: If you registered for the [**AvailabilityChanged**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn894317), you should unregister the handler when you dispose of the lamp resource.
trans-unit.target: If you registered for the [**AvailabilityChanged**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn894317), you should unregister the handler when you dispose of the lamp resource.

trans-unit.source: The right place in your code to dispose of the lamp resource depends on your app.
trans-unit.target: The right place in your code to dispose of the lamp resource depends on your app.

trans-unit.source: To scope lamp access to a single page, release the resource in the [**OnNavigatingFrom**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br227509) event.
trans-unit.target: To scope lamp access to a single page, release the resource in the [**OnNavigatingFrom**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br227509) event.
